name: Set.biUnion_finsetSigma_univ
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
α : Type u_2
κ : ι → Type u_3
inst✝ : (i : ι) → Fintype (κ i)
s : Finset ι
f : Sigma κ → Set α
⊢ Eq (Set.iUnion fun ij => Set.iUnion fun h => f ij) (Set.iUnion fun i => Set.iUnion fun h => Set.iUnion fun j => f ⟨i, j⟩)
decl:
lemma Set.biUnion_finsetSigma_univ (s : Finset ι) (f : Sigma κ → Set α) :
    ⋃ ij ∈ s.sigma fun _ ↦ Finset.univ, f ij = ⋃ i ∈ s, ⋃ j, f ⟨i, j⟩ := by aesop

name: Set.biUnion_finsetSigma_univ'
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
α : Type u_2
κ : ι → Type u_3
inst✝ : (i : ι) → Fintype (κ i)
s : Finset ι
f : (i : ι) → κ i → Set α
⊢ Eq (Set.iUnion fun i => Set.iUnion fun h => Set.iUnion fun j => f i j) (Set.iUnion fun ij => Set.iUnion fun h => f ij.fst ij.snd)
decl:
lemma Set.biUnion_finsetSigma_univ' (s : Finset ι) (f : Π i, κ i → Set α) :
    ⋃ i ∈ s, ⋃ j, f i j = ⋃ ij ∈ s.sigma fun _ ↦ Finset.univ, f ij.1 ij.2 := by aesop

lemma Set.biInter_finsetSigma_univ (s : Finset ι) (f : Sigma κ → Set α) :
    ⋂ ij ∈ s.sigma fun _ ↦ Finset.univ, f ij = ⋂ i ∈ s, ⋂ j, f ⟨i, j⟩ := by aesop

name: Set.biInter_finsetSigma_univ'
initialProofState:

α : Type u_2

inst✝ : (i : ι) → Fintype (κ i)
s : Finset ι
f : (i : ι) → κ i → Set α
⊢ Eq (Set.iInter fun i => Set.iInter fun h => Set.iInter fun j => f i j) (Set.iInter fun ij => Set.iInter fun h => f ij.fst ij.snd)

lemma Set.biInter_finsetSigma_univ' (s : Finset ι) (f : Π i, κ i → Set α) :
    ⋂ i ∈ s, ⋂ j, f i j = ⋂ ij ∈ s.sigma fun _ ↦ Finset.univ, f ij.1 ij.2 := by aesop

name: Finset.univ_sigma_univ
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
κ : ι → Type u_3
inst✝¹ : (i : ι) → Fintype (κ i)
inst✝ : Fintype ι
⊢ Eq (Finset.univ.sigma fun x => Finset.univ) Finset.univ
decl: @[simp] lemma Finset.univ_sigma_univ : univ.sigma (fun _ ↦ univ) = (univ : Finset (Σ i, κ i)) := rfl
